segment: Effective Date: May 7, 2015     Kraft Site Privacy Notice    This website is owned and operated by Kraft Foods Group, Inc. At Kraft, we recognize that visitors to our site may be concerned about the information they provide to us and how we handle that information. This Privacy Notice describes the types of information we collect from and about you when you visit this website (and the mobile optimized version of this website), how we may use and disclose such information, and your ability to control certain uses of it.
